doc:
Paul Claudon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Claudon 0 Paul Claudon (5 September 1919 – 5 July 2002) was a French film producer and actor. He produced 25 films between 1952 and 1998. He was a member of the jury at the 21st Berlin International Film Festival and the 1979 Cannes Film Festival. Paul_Claudon ( 5_September_1919 – 5_July_2002 ) was a_French_film_producer_and_actor . He produced 25_films between 1952_and_1998 . He was a_member of the_jury at the_21st_Berlin_International_Film_Festival and the_1979_Cannes_Film_Festival .
